Question
========

A multinomial logistic regression analysis is performed to examine the relationship between a quantitative predictor and a nominal outcome consisting of five categories ($c = 5$) mapping. The SPSS results provide estimates of 4 regression coefficients.

Which test can be used to test in 1 whether the 4 regression coefficients are significantly different from 0? 
Answerlist
----------
* *-test
* *-test
* Likelihood-ratio key
* *key

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
